opennlp.ccg.test
Class CrossValidateRealizer

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.test.CrossValidateRealizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScorerMaker
public class CrossValidateRealizer
extends Object
implements ScorerMaker

Runs cross-validation tests with the realizer.

Version:
$Revision: 1.30 $, $Date: 2011/03/20 20:11:58 $
Author:
Michael White
